Mariyam has some savings, and she is requesting a 25,000 PKR loan through the Kashf Foundation to purchase another buffalo in milk to inflate her sales. She expects a boost in her earnings and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo in milk to inflate her sales.

loans.name: Deysi Aracely

texts.es:
Deysi, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de fortalecer su negocio de venta de tortillas, ya que esta es una fuente favorable para obtener ingresos. Este le permitirá comprar maíz para elaborar las tortillas, asi mismo para adquirir cerdos, pericos, gallinas y  alimentación necesaria para los animales.
El crédito anterior le permitió mejorar las ganancias, logro darle la alimentación primordial a los animales para luego venderlos. Las circunstancias familiares han mejorado y las condiciones económicas, ya que sus hijos han logrado seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Deysi is requesting a new loan because she needs to strengthen her tortilla business, which is a favorable source of income. This will enable her to buy corn for making tortillas. She will also acquire pigs, parakeets, chickens, and the necessary feed for these animals.

Her previous loan helped to improve her earnings. She was able to provide essential feed for her animals before selling them. Her family’s circumstances and financial condition have improved. As a result, her children were able to continue their studies.

loans.use: to buy corn for making tortillas as well as pigs, parakeets, chickens, and animal feed.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Ms Bushra is a 25-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. She has been doing a tailoring business for the past 4 years to support her husband. She accepts the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the household expenses as well as the educational needs of their children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family as well.
 
She, together with her husband, manage their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she has requested for a loan of Rs.15,000/- to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons and laces in various colors. In this way she will be able to meet with the increasing demand for her tailoring services. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Bushra hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Naghma

texts.en: Ms Naghma is a 32-year-old married woman. She is providing the services of home cooking for the past 3 years. She enjoys making food and has become famous in her town for proving these facilities. She takes orders from nearby hotels and people in her community and makes enough to lead a decent life. She is a responsible mother and needs to earn more to bear the daily expenditures of her family members. That is why she has requested a loan of 20,000 PKR to enhance her business. It would enable her to purchase packs of oil, salts and spices in large quantities to inflate her sales, which ultimately will help in generating more cash. She wishes to utilize her earned profits on her children’s education and well-being.

loans.use: to purchase packs of oil, salts and spices in large quantities to inflate her sales.

loans.name: Pathany

texts.en:
Ms. Pathany is a 41-year old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of her house. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts for years. 

Pathany is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide them with good quality food, clothing and education. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and grains to meet with the increasing demand at her store. 

She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and grains to meet with the increasing demand at her store.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
Claudia de 40 años de edad, labora como comerciante independiente en la venta de ropa, accesorios y lociones, cuenta aprendió de la actividad, gracias a la oportunidad que tuvo de trabajar en una tienda. 
Hoy se siente satisfecha por la decisión que tomó debido a que su negocio le deja buenas ganancias, lo que le permite garantizarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía debido a que se acerca el día de madres, lo que le permitirá aumentar su volumen de ventas generándole mejores ingresos. 
Su mayor sueño es expandir su negocio y abrir su propia tienda de ropa.
texts.en:
Claudia is 40 years old. She works as an independent merchant selling clothes, accessories and lotions. She says she learned the activity thanks to an opportunity she had to work in a store. 
 
Today she feels satisfied with the the decision she made because her business brings in good earnings. This allows her to guarantee her family a better quality of life. Today she is asking for a loan that she will invest in buying merchandise because Mother's Day is coming up. This will allow her to increase her sales volume, generating better income. 

Her biggest dream is expanding her business and open her own clothing store.

loans.use: To buy men's and women's jeans.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en: Ms Bushra is a 49-years-old woman and a loving mother of five children.  Her husband’s income alone is insufficient to meet the family expenditures. Therefore, Bushra started her own sewing business to contribute towards the family income. She is quite expert in the techniques of stitching and makes enough to support her entire family. However, due to lack of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers, so she contacted Kashf Foundation to apply for a loan of Rs. 20,000. She intends to use this loan amount to buy stitching material such as spools of threads with packs of needles and zippers to create a means of increasing her revenue, so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to buy stitching materials such as spools of threads with packs of needles and zippers.

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Ms Salma is 40 year old married woman. She has had a business selling vegetables in her community for the past ten years. She is very enthusiastic in her business and manages to earn a reasonable amount of money to support her family. Her husband also supports her by selling vegetables on a cart in different nearby communities. 
Salma is a loving mother of three children and is responsible for their food, health and education. She is trying hard to fulfill their basic necessities through her business. For the improvement of her business, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase stocks of potatoes, onions and ginger to inflate her sales. She dreams of providing quality education to her children towards their prosperous future.

loans.use: to purchase stock of potatoes, onions and ginger to inflate her sales.

loans.name: Shanaz

texts.en: Ms Shanaz is a 38-years-old married woman. She and her husband have been running a business of selling milk for the past 10 years. The man shown in the photo is Shanaz’s husband.  They have three cows and one buffalo. They sell their milk to many of their neighbors. Shanaz also looks after the cows and buffalo as well as performing the task of collecting milk from them while her husband sells it to different places on a daily basis. They feel pleasure while doing this business to secure their childrens' future. They have three children, two of them whom are school-going. They need to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures including food, clothing and education. In order to increase profits, Shanaz has equested for a loan of Rs 30,000/- to purchase another cow.  It will enable them to cater for more people of their community, which ultimately will help in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Dúo Grande Solo Dios Group

texts.es:
DÚO GRANDE SOLO DIOS 
Doña Susana es originaria de Tecpan, tiene 46 años de edad, bajo su responsabilidad están sus  2  hijos menores de edad ella  se dedica a la  elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano.  
Desde hace algunos años ella ha  realizado esta  actividad ya que es el medio que tiene para salir adelante con su familia.    
El esposo de ella trabaja como agricultor, sembrando verduras y hortalizas, y lo poco que  gana ayuda para los gastos de la casa gracias al apoyo de el y de sus hijos  doña Susana sigue elaborando sus tejidos.
El sueño de doña Susana es tener un negocio mas grande para obtener mejores ganancias y así mandar a sus hijos a la escuela esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion de tejidos tipicos a mano.
texts.en:
“Grande Solo Dios” Group

Doña Susana, age 46, is originally from Tecpan. She is responsible for two young children. Susana makes traditional handwoven items. She has been in this line of work for a few years and it has allowed her to help her family move forward.

Susana’s husband works as a farmer, planting greens and vegetables. What little he earns helps with the household expenses. Thanks to the support of her husband and children, Doña Susana continues to make her woven items.

Her dream is to have a larger business so that she can generate more income and send her children to school. She is requesting a loan so that she can buy raw materials for making her traditional handwoven items.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making traditional handwoven items.

loans.name: Maria Argelia

texts.es: María de 40 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora quien vive junto a sus tres hijos, Como toda madre responsable María trabaja en su sala de belleza, con el fin de vivir mejor ya que puede contar con una fuente extra de ingresos que le permite darles todo lo necesario a sus hijos. María solicita un credito con el deseo de mejorar su sala de belleza surtiéndola de productos de marcas reconocidas, tintes para el cabello, cremas para el cuidado de la piel y todo lo necesario para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. De esta manera ella espera mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
María, age 40, is a hardworking woman who lives with her three children. She works in a beauty salon. Like any responsible mother, María wants her family to live better. Being able to generate extra income enables her to provide everything that her children need.

Wanting to improve her beauty salon, María is requesting a loan so that she can stock her business with brand name products that are well-known. These items include hair dyes, skin care crèmes, and other supplies that she needs to provide better service to her customers. In this manner, she expects to improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Eucaris

texts.es:
Eucaris de 42 años de edad, es madre cabeza de familia de cuatro hijos. Debido a su precaria condición económica y a la carencia educativa, esta mujer optó por dedicarse a la fabricación y venta de arepas con el fin de generar los recursos suficientes para la manutención y la educación de sus hijos. Hoy lleva más de diez años realizando la actividad, lo que le ha permitido fidelizar muchos de sus clientes.
Hoy distribuye su producto en varias tiendas y supermercados de su localidad.
Con el fin de aumentar la producción debido a  la alta demanda, Eucaris se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de maíz al por mayor para reducir costo y aumentar sus ganancias.
Sueña con garantizarles una vida digna a su familia y una educación de calidad a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Eucaris  is 42 years old. She is a mother of four children and the main breadwinner. Due to her precarious financial condition and lack of education, this woman opted to make and sell arepas in order to generate enough resources to support and education her children. Today she has been doing this activity for more than 10 years. It has allowed her to gain many faithful customers.  

Today she distributes her product in several stores and supermarkets in her community. in order to increase production due to high demand, Eucaris is asking for a loan that she will invest in buy corn wholesale to reduce costs and increase her earnings. She dream of being able to guarantee her family a dignified life and her children a quality education.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale.

loans.name: Madeleine Gertrude

texts.fr:
Madeleine Gertrude est une jeune femme de 33 ans dont les revenus sont très faibles.
Elle exerce depuis plus de 3 ans dans la vente de poisson et de boissons.Son activité est florissante du fait de la bonne qualité des poissons qu'elle vend et qui proviennent directement de la pêche dans les eaux voisines.
Avec l'argent qu'elle obtiendra , elle compte acheter plus de poissons et de boissons pour étendre son activité et ainsi augmenter ses revenus; ce qui lui permettra de mieux subvenir aux besoins des membres de sa famille.
texts.en:
Madeleine Gertrude is a  33-year old woman whose revenues are very low. For three years she has been selling fish and beverages. Her business is growing thanks to the good quality of her fish, received directly from local fishermen.

Thanks to the funds obtained, she plans to buy more fish and beverages in order to expand her business and thus increase her revenues. This will allow her to better provide for her family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy food items.

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.es:
Genoveva de 56 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y con muchos sueños por materializar, ama su familia y asegura que son su mayor fortaleza para levantarse cada mañana y luchar por generar el pan de cada día. Desde hace más de ocho años trabaja en su tienda dedicada a la venta  de productos de la canasta familiar, mecatos y verduras. Gracias al dinero que genera esta mujer ha logrado brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
Su mayor deseo es surtir mejor su negocio, debido a que sus clientes le solicitan continuamente productos con los que no cuenta, lo que le ocasiona pérdidas monetarias y de clientes, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía lo que le permitirá elevar su nivel de ingresos.
texts.en:
Genoveva, 56, is an enterprising woman with many dreams to fulfill. She loves her family and claims they are her greatest strength for getting up each morning and working hard to generate an income.

For more than eight years she has been working in her store where she sells staple products, pastries and vegetables. Due to the money that this woman generates, she has managed to provide a better quality of life for her family.

Her greatest wish is to stock her store better, because her customers continuously ask for products which she does not have and that results in a loss of money and customers. 

Therefore she is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise which will allow her to elevate her level of income.

loans.use: to buy staple products.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria de 45 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde su casa con el fin de generar los ingresos necesarios para  el sostenimiento de su hogar. Asegura que el mundo de los negocios es su gran pasión y lo que mejor sabe hacer. Su familia es la razón de su existencia, por lo cual trata de pasar la mayor parte del tiempo en casa y disfrutar de cada instante con su madre. 
Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía con el propósito de hacer entrega de los encargos que le han solicitado para el día de las madres que se celebrará en el mes de mayo.
Su mayor deseo es en un futo próximo montar su tienda de ropa.
texts.en:
Gloria, who is 45-years old, makes her living selling clothing from her home.  Her goal is to make the money she needs to support her household.  She says that the business world is her greatest passion and what she knows best.  Gloria's family is her reason for being, as such she tries to spend as much time as possible at home enjoying every moment with her mother. 
Gloria is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise.  She wants to be able to deliver the products that have been ordered for Mother's Day, which is celebrated in the month of May. 
Gloria's greatest wish is to, in the near future, open up a clothing store.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (clothing)

loans.name: Shamshad

texts.en:
Shamshad is a 41-year-old woman. She has been running a beauty parlor for three years. She shared that her life has not been easy, due to the fact that her husband abandoned her and she had to assume all responsibilities for the home and the well-being of her two children. Despite the difficult economic situation that Shamshad confronted, her hope was never extinguished. Her children became the fundamental factor in her desire to get ahead. 

With the support of Kashf Foundation she initiated her business, and now she has become famous on her street for providing the best quality services. In order to cater more customers, she requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to purchase packs of creams, cleansers and makeup kits. She wishes to spend part of the income on the expansion of her business. Shamshad is very thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy packs of creams, cleansers and makeup kits.

loans.name: Ignacio

texts.es:
Ignacio de 65 años de edad, es un hombre emprendedor que ve en cada dificultad una oportunidad para salir adelante. Cuenta que su idea de negocios surgió debido a la necesidad que detectó en su barrio por un café internet, oportunidad que transformó en idea de negocio y hoy se ha convertido en su fuente de ingresos para él y su familia. 
Lleva seis meses con el desarrollo de la actividad y se siente muy satisfecho por la respuesta de la personas del sector, Razón por la cual se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un equipo de computo y adecuaciones locativas con el propósito de mejorar la calidad en el servicio.
Espera que su negocio siga creciendo para garantizarle a su hijo menor el acceso a la educación superior.
texts.en:
Ignacio, who is 65-years old, is an enterprising man who sees possibility in every difficult situation.  He says that his business idea came from noticing that his neighborhood needed an internet cafe.  It was an opportunity that became a business idea and now provides Ignacio and his family with their income.  
Ignacio has been developing his business for six months, and he feels quite satisfied with the response from the people in the area.  And that is why he his looking for a loan: to invest in the purchase of computer equiptment and to make some alterations to his cafe.  His goal is to improve the quality of the service he offers. 
Ignacio hopes for his business to keep growing, which would guarantee his youngest son access to higher education.

loans.use: to purchase computer equipment and make some alterations to his cafe.

loans.name: Naveeda

texts.en:
Ms. Naveeda is a 22-year-old married woman. She is a very talented lady and excels in the work of stitching. Over time she has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community, and she makes enough to contribute in the family income. 

To cope with the increasing demands of her customers she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to purchase more reels of thread with packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Naveeda hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a good quality standard of living to her family.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread with packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Ishrat

texts.en:
Ishrat is a 36-year-old married woman and mother of five children, two daughters and three sons. The man shown in the photo is Ishrat’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Ishrat has applied for a loan of PKR 20,000 for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Ishrat is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fabric.

loans.name: Jairo Javier

texts.es:
Jairo a sus 55 años de edad, es propietario de una tienda ubicada  el municipio de Bello, Colombia, en la cual trabaja hace cinco años. Se encuentra casado y tiene dos hijos. Gracias a su  negocio genera los ingresos con los cuales puede llevar la responsabilidad de su hogar. 
En la actualidad, se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que desea comprar productos de la canasta familiar, con el fin de aumentar su inventario y obtener mayores ingresos. 
Su mayor sueño es expandir su negocio y convertirlo en un mercado autoservicio para generar empleos directos en su comunidad y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jairo, at his 55 years, is the owner of a small store located in the municipality of Bello, Colombia.  He has been in the business for five years.  Jairo is married and has two children.  Thanks to his business, he earns the income he needs to support his household. 
Jairo is currently requesting a loan to purchase basic grocery items.  His goal is to increase his inventory and earn a better income. 
Jairo's greatest dream is to expand his business and turn it into a supermarket.  That would generate employment directly in his community and offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grocery items.

loans.name: José De La Cruz

texts.es:
Durante toda su vida José se ha dedicado al comercio, debido a que desde niño sus padres le inculcaron la importancia de trabajar y salir adelante. Desde hace varios años, decidió montar su propio negocio dedicado a la venta de productos de la canasta familiar,  dirigidos a satisfacer las necesidades del sector. Hoy es una persona que goza de la estima entre sus vecinos y familiares.  
A sus 33 años, este hombre, es padre de familia de un hijo de tres años de edad, por el cual vela a fin de garantizarle en un futuro próximo una buena educación.
José desea comprar surtido con el propósito de generar mayores ingresos y cumplir su sueño de adquirir una vivienda y poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José has made his living in business his whole life long.  Since he was a young boy, his parents instilled in him the importance of working and getting ahead.  A few years ago, José decided to open his own business selling the basic grocery items needed in his neighborhood.  Today, he is a person who enjoys his neighbors' and his family's respect.   
At his 33 years, José is father to a three-year old son.  He works hard to guarantee his son, in the near future, a good education. 
José wants to purchase an assortment of goods to help generate a greater income and fulfill his dream of acquiring a house and offering his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase basic grocery items.

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишеру 37 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Дети еще маленькие. Его жена Баёнат очень хорошая домохозяйка. Она помогает Алишеру введение бизнеса. Более 13 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как лук, морковь и хлопок. В этом году он посеял на 0.35 га лук, 0.65 га морковь и собирается еще сделать посев хлопка. Он упорно трудится, чтобы получать больше дохода и развевать бизнес. Полученный доход он будет продавать на местном рынке. Так как у него высококачественный урожай, так и его товары имеют большой спрос. Кроме жены его брат помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Он хочет сделать посев хлопка, но не имеет денег для покупки семена, топлива и минерального удобрения. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Alisher is 37 years old. He is married and has four children, who are all still young. His wife Bayonat is a very good housewife. She helps Alisher run the business. He has farmed crops such as onions, carrots and wheat for over 13 years. This year he planted 0.35 hectares of onion, 0.65 hectares of carrot, and plans to also sow wheat. He works very hard to achieve good yields and develop his business. He sells his harvest at the local market. Since he has high quality products, there is large demand for them. Besides his wife, his brother also helps with the business. Alisher would like to plant wheat but doesn't have the money for seed, fuel, and fertilizer. He is asking for a loan of 1000 dollars. He is grateful for your generosity.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers and fuel for the land where he grows onions, carrots and wheat

loans.name: Muhriddin

texts.ru: Мухриддину 30 лет. Он энергичный человек, который всегда старается реализовать свои идеи в реальность. Он женат на прекрасной женщине, которая является домохозяйкой и занимается воспитанием детей. Мухриддин имеет 2 детей. Дети не совершеннолетние. Мухриддин более 6 лет занимается купле продажей сим карт и пополнение баланса телефонов. Он очень хорошо знает все тонкости своего дела и с легкостью справляется. Его братья помогают ему введение бизнеса. Он хочет развевать бизнес и таким образом увеличить доход. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки сим карт, чтобы пополнить оборотный капитал. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muhriddin is 30 years old. He is an energetic man who is always trying to make his ideas into reality. He is married to a wonderful woman who is now a housewife, raising their two young children. Muhriddin has been selling SIM cards and refilling mobile phone accounts for over six years. He knows every detail of his work and handles it easily. His brother helps him with the business. Muhriddin wants to expand the business and thereby increase his income, so he is asking for a $1000 loan to buy SIM cards, which will increase his working capital. He is grateful for your generosity.

loans.use: To buy more sim- cards to increasing working capital

loans.name: Vera

texts.ru:
Вера – из Новой Каховки. Она торгует на одном из местных рынков. Вера продает женскую одежду, арендуя землю у администрации рынка, торгует в палатке. В торговле занята уже 17 лет. 
Вера обратилась к КИВА за финансовой помощью в 21 000 гривен с целью закупить весеннюю одежду, а именно блузки и брюки, а также приобрести искусственные цветы на продажу параллельно с ассортиментом одежды. Часто в Украине рыночным предпринимателям приходится совмещать разные товары на продажу, чтобы поддерживать свой бизнес, особенно в периоды затишья на рынках. Вера тоже использует этот подход в своем бизнесе.
texts.en:
Vera is from Novaya Kahovka, where she sells in one of the local markets. She sells women's clothing from space rented from the market administrators. She has been in this business for 17 years. 

Vera has come to KIVA for financial help in the form of a 21,000 hryvnia loan for buying spring clothing, particularly blouses and plants, and also fake flowers to sell alongside the clothing. In Ukraine market sellers often mix different good together for sale to support their business, especially when business at the market is slow. Vera is also taking this approach for her business.

loans.use: buy spring clothing, especially blouses and pants, and buy fake flowers to sell along with the clothing.

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru: Дилшод добросовестный человек, который живет вместе семьей в отдаленном регионе, в старом доме, где очень тяжело проводить зиму, так как его дом не имеет нормального условия. Его жена очень добрая женщина и помогает ему выращиванию сельхоз культур. Они имеют на воспитании 4 детей. Кроме жены его старший сын помогает ему введение бизнеса, так как он более 10 лет занимается выращиванию зерновых культур. Он знает все аспекты своего дела. Благодаря упорному труду он получает хорошего урожая. Он хочет развевать бизнес и таким образом увеличить доход. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 15000 сомони для покупки семена для нового посева, а также для покупки строительных материалов, так как он собирается отремонтировать свой дом. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dilshod is a conscientious man who lives with his family in a remote area, in an old house. The inadequate condition of their housing makes it tough to get through the winter. Dilshod's wife is a very kind woman. She helps him farm. They have four children. Beside his wife, Dilshod's older brother also helps with the business, since he has over 10 years of experience raising grain crops.  Dilshod knows every aspect of his work, and his tireless labor earns him good harvests. He would like to expand the business and increase its yield. He is asking for a 15,000 somoni loan to buy seeds for the next planting, and also to buy building materials for repairs to his house. He is grateful for your generosity.

loans.use: To buy seeds for planting and building materials for house repairs

loans.name: Viktor

texts.ru:
Виктор – из села Пролетарка. Он уже на протяжении 10 лет занимается тепличным хозяйством. На 35 сотках земли Виктор выращивает на продажу огурцы, кабачки, перец, укроп, петрушку, а также ежевику и виноград. 
Виктору нужна сумма в 7 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить пленку для теплиц, а также материалы для достройки теплиц, чтобы утеплить их получше. Подготовив теплицы к сезону, Виктор сможет получить доход с продажи ранних овощей и зелени, а также заработает на нужды семьи и бизнеса.
texts.en: Viktor is from the town of Proletarka. He has been in greenhouse agriculture for the past 10 years. Viktor grows cucumbers, cabbage, peppers, dill, parsley, berries, and grapes for sale on 0.35 hectares of land. He needs 7,000 hryvnia to buy greenhouse plastic and also materials to do some construction on the greenhouses so that they heat better. Once he has prepared the greenhouses for the season, he can earn a good income selling early cucumbers and herbs, and provide for his family and business.

loans.use: buy greenhouse plastic, and materials to complete greenhouses so that they heat better.

loans.name: Maqsoodo

texts.en:
Ms Maqsoodo had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband and to support her family for a better future. 

Two years ago she began stitching work in her house. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. Therefore she requested a loan of 30,000 Pakistan rupees (PKR) to buy raw materials such as threads in different colors as well as packs of laces and zippers. With these, she will create a means of increasing revenues so she can generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as threads in different colors, as well as packs of laces and zippers.

loans.name: Zakia

texts.en:
Ms. Zakia is a 36-year-old married woman and a mother of five. She has been successfully running a small general store to fulfill the basic needs of the family members, such as good quality food, clothing and health care. 

She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 25,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages to cater more customers time after time. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future. “Self-reliance is the key to survival,” Zakia remarked thoughtfully.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages to cater to more customers time after time.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en:
Ms. Nazia has expertise in embroidery and has been using her skill to provide for her family for over five years now. She started this line of work at a very young age. During the initial years of her business, she barely made enough money to purchase the required material. Today, she is proud to be famous in her community at being the best at making beautiful patterns with thread and beads. 

Currently, she requests a loan worth 25,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) to purchase more spools of threads with packs of sequins, pearls and beads in different colors. She says that the females in her community are becoming demanding with the passage of time and satisfying them is a challenge that Nazia has taken up. She dreams to purchase her own house with her earned profits.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of threads with packs of sequins, pearls and beads in different colors.

loans.name: Sahnaz

texts.en:
Ms. Sahnaz is a 42-year-old married woman. She is a vigorous lady and for the past five years, she has been running a cloth business. Sahnaz buys cloths of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business.

Sahnaz is requesting a loan of 35,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) from Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. Shanaz expects a boost in her earnings with her loan, and she plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory.

loans.name: Amber

texts.en:
Ms. Amber is a 26-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. The man shown in the photo is Amber’s husband. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts over the years. 

She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 20,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store.

loans.name: Nahayat

texts.en:
Ms. Nahayat is a 33-year-old married woman and a mother of four. She is been in a beauty-parlor business for many years. She offers many services to her customers, such as makeup, hairstyling and facials. Through her skill at providing services, she has become very famous in her street. 

In order to meet the increasing demand from her customers, she is interested in buying more varieties of cosmetics products for her parlor. But because of having low cash in hand, she contacted Kashf Foundation to apply for a loan of 35,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) to buy hair-care products, skin products and bleaching and whitening creams in large quantities. She is hopeful to cater to more customers time after time and dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy hair-care products, skin products and bleaching and whitening creams in large quantities.

loans.name: Zuhra

texts.en:
Ms. Zuhra is a 37-year-old lady. She is very talented and excels in the work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community, so she decided to initiate her own business to contribute to the family income, as her husband’s income is nominal and not enough to cover family expenditures.

Zuhra very well knows the techniques of stitching, and her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue operations of her business, she requested a loan of 25,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) to buy stock of threads in different colors with packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stock of threads in different colors with packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Ms. Naseem is 38 years old and a married mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Naseem’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Naseem applied for a loan of 35,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Naseem is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucila no está casada pero vive con su cónyuge y tiene tres hijos dos varones y una mujer que están en etapa escolar, vive en  casa propia donde cuenta con un ambiente y se encuentra el dormitorio y la cocina, la  habitación es de adobe y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Coripata sector Choro Grande de Los Yungas del departamento  de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja junto con su pareja en el  cultivo de hortalizas en forma rudimentaria en un terreno de su propiedad y también al reciclado de plásticos; sus productos los comercializa por la misma zona donde vive  y en la ciudad de La Paz, el lugar de trabajo es un lugar lleno de tierra y polvo, ya que el camino está lleno de tierra, ellos trabajan todos los días de la semana, ambos  colaboran en el pago de los servicios, comida y vestimenta, y educación de sus hijos.
El crédito lo requiere para  herramienta de trabajo; comprará de una moto que le sirva para desplazarse más rápidamente,  ya que el lugar de trabajo está situado a una distancia de 10 kilómetros y la escuela que estudian sus hijos está a una distancia de 6 kilómetros de su casa. 
El sueño de Lucila es poder contar con herramientas de trabajo que le facilita a mejorar su producción y así  mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Lucila is not married but she lives with her partner and has three school-aged children: two boys and one girl. She owns the house where she lives. The dwelling is made of adobe, and has an earthen floor, a bedroom and a kitchen. The house is located in the Coripata zone of Choro Grande de Los Yungas in the administrative division of La Paz. 

She currently works alongside her partner cultivating vegetables on the plot of land that they own using basic techniques. They also recycle plastics. She sells her produce in the same zone where she lives and also in the city of La Paz. Her workplace is full of soil and dust because the road is full of soil. They work every day of the week, collaborating to pay for services, food and clothes, and for the education of their children. 

She requires a loan to assist in her work; She will buy a motorcycle to help her get around more quickly. Her place of work is located 10km away and the school where her children study is 6km from their house. 

Lucila's dream is to have tools for her work that help her improve her production and thus improve her quality of living. This is her first time requesting a loan from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to travel more quickly from her house to the plot of land where she grows vegetables, located 10km away.

loans.name: Ursula Mabel

texts.es: ursula de 40 años de edad vive con su mama, su hermana y sus 2 hijo en casa propia; ella posee una chalet donde vende golosinas como churros, dulces, galletas, entre otras cosas, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada adentro de en un colegio cerca de su lugar de residencia, obtiene muchas ganancias y con eso logra cubrir los gastos de su hogar, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su chalet, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Forty-year-old Ursula lives with her mother, sister and two children in their own house.  Ursula has a hut from which she sells sweet things such as "churros" (long fritters), biscuits, candy and more.  She has had the business for some years and it has given her experience in sales which has allowed her to earn the the best possible profits.  Ursula's hut is inside a school, near her home. She makes a high profit which she uses to cover household costs.  Ursula wants to expand the business and put in more investment.  However, she needs capital for this so is applying for a loan that will allow her to buy necessary items for her hut.  She assures us that she will pay off her debt and says she is confident that the loan will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy products (sweet things, biscuits, candy etc).

loans.name: Eugenia Melesia

texts.es: Doña Eugenia vive con su hermano y su hija en casa propia tiene una tortilleria desde hace varios años en su lugar de residencia, trabaja de lunes a domingo y con las ganancias que obtiene logra cubrir los gastos que tiene en su hogar. Doña Eugenia solicita un credito para poder comprar productos para poder elaborar sus tortillas como: maiz, gas, entre otras cosas y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando a su familia sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en: Eugenia lives with her brother and daughter in her own house.  She has had her own tortilla stand at her home for some years.  She works Monday to Sunday and is able to cover household costs with her profits.  Eugenia is applying for a loan so that she can buy products for preparing her tortillas, such as corn, gas and more.  With this she will be able to make higher profits and continue to help her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tortillas.

loans.name: Gloria Elizabeth

texts.es: Doña gloria de 53 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijo se dedica a vender panes(hot dogs) en un carrito como muestra la fotografia con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante y cubrir todos los gastos de su hogar, ella solicita un credito para poder comprar productos para la elaboracion de sus panes como: repollos, mortadelas, mayonesas,panes, entre otras cosas que le sirven para la elaboracion y asi poder seguir teniendo mas ingresos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Gloria is 53 years old and lives with her husband and two children.  She makes a living selling hot dogs from a cart, as you can see in the photo.  Gloria has managed to cover all the household bills and prosper with the profits she has earned.  She is now applying for a loan to buy ingredients for making hot dogs, such as cabbage, sausages, mayonnaise, bread and more.  These items will be used to make the hot dogs and thus Gloria will continue to earn an income and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing hot dogs.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Ms Zahida is a 26-year-old vigorous lady. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. 

However, due to a lack of available funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 from the Kashf Foundation. 

She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues, so she can generate a healthier source of income. 

She is in her 3rd loan cycle and thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Ms Shahnaz is a 55-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands including food, health, clothing and education. 

She has been manufacturing footballs with the support of her son for many years. She makes balls in different sizes and sells them in her community and in the local market. Shahnaz wants to grow her business, so she has requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to purchase stocks of thread, rubber bladders and leather covers to inflate her sales.

In this way, she will be able to cater for her customers time after time. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of providing a quality education for her children through all her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of thread, rubber bladders and leather covers to inflate her sales.

loans.name: Rehana

texts.en:
Ms Rehana is a 39-year-old married woman and has been running a milk selling business with the support of her husband for fifteen years. 

She has three buffaloes and sells their milk to many of their neighbors, along with butter and cheese, which she makes from the milk. She earns enough to contribute to the family income. 

She is a mother of six and is working hard to fulfill the needs of her children. In order to serve more people in her community, she needs to purchase one more buffalo. So she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 from the Kashf Foundation. 

She hopes to increase the milk production capacity, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.name: Akhtar

texts.en:
Ms Akhtar is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of seven children. 

For the past two years, she has been successfully running a milk selling business. She has two buffaloes and one cow.  She has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk. She has a good client list and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. Akhtar's husband is employed in a surgical factory, but his income is not sufficient to meet the needs of the family members alone. 

For the improvement of her business, Akhtar requested a loan of PKR 30,000 from the Kashf Foundation to purchase one more buffalo in milk to inflate her sales. 

She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo in milk to inflate her sales.

loans.name: Shama

texts.en:
Ms Shama is a 37-year-old married woman and is running a milk selling business. 

She has gained ten years experience in this field. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family. With the passage of time, her sales increased and also her income. Now she has three buffaloes. 

This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She supports her family in all matters as well as financial matters. She has eight family members. 

She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Martha Irene

texts.es: doña martha vive con sus 5 hijo en casa de una tia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en su lugar de residencia es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Martha lives with her five children in her aunt's house.  She has a shop where she sells staple items such as beans, milk, eggs, bread and more.  Martha has had the business for many years and it has given her lots of experience in sales, allowing her to earn high profits.  The shop is in her home and is well known to locals in the area.  Martha has many customers.  The shop is well-stocked and she wants to increase business and invest more.  However, she needs capital so is applying for a loan that will allow her to buy necessary items for her shop.  She assures us that she will pay off the debt and also says that the loan with provide her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (sweets, eggs, oil and more).

loans.name: Anita

texts.es:
Anita, de 27 años de edad, es una mujer empeñosa y decidida, además de alegre y cordial, es soltera y aun no tiene hijos, vive en la casa de sus padres a quienes brinda todo el apoyo necesario para ayudarlos a salir adelante.El negocio que tiene Anita está relacionado al sector salud ya que tiene un consultorio médico en un local alquilado y ahí recibe diversos pacientes que llegan con dolencias leves para encontrar soluciones a sus malestares. Estudió enfermería y hoy pone en práctica a diario todo lo que aprendió desde suturas, curaciones, inyecciones y otros. Lleva en esta actividad 1 año y hasta el momento le va bien. También vende gaseosas y tiene un mototaxi que pone en alquiler diariamente. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite aplicar todo lo que aprendió en sus estudios, además siente satisfacción cuando sus pacientes regresan a casa contentos por haber solucionado sus malestares, espera incrementar su consultorio con la compra progresiva de los equipos necesarios para detección de enfermedades mas complejas. 
En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 3500, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de agujas, jeringas, alcohol, gasas, medicinas de mayor uso y guantes quirúrgicos para que pueda seguir realizando su trabajo.
texts.en:
Anita, 27, is a hard-working, determined woman who is also cheerful and cordial.  She is single, has no children, and lives with her parents who she tries to help as much as possible to get ahead.  Anita is a medical consultant and rents a space where she receives patients with diverse minor ailments so she can find a solution to help them.  

She studied nursing and puts into practice on a daily basis everything she learned about sutures, cures, injections and other things.  She has been in business for a year and, up until now, it has been going well.  She also sells soft drinks and rents out a motor-taxi on a daily basis.  She enjoys her work because it allows her to put into practice everything she studied.  She also feels satisfied knowing that her patients go home happy that their problems have been resolved.  She hopes to increase her consulting activity through the eventual purchase of equipment necessary to detect more complex illnesses.

On this occasion, she is requesting 3,500 PEN and is counting on your help to continue toward her goals.  The loan will be used to buy needles, syringes, alcohol, gauze, medicines widely used and surgical gloves so she can continue working.l

loans.use: To buy needles, syringes, alcohol and other health products.

loans.name: Elmer Balmore

texts.es: Elmer vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa de un familiar, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, desde hace varios años por lo que tiene la experiencia necesaria para sacar adelante el negocio cuando ya esta la cosecha la va almacenado en los graneros que muestra la fotografia para luego salir a comercializarlos, tiene mucha clientela en la zona donde reside, con las ganancias que obtiene logra sacar adelante su familia, él solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol de la mejor calidad, además de abono y pesticidas y asi poder darle a su familia, una vida con mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Elmer lives with his common-law wife and their children in a relative's home.  He has been growing corn and beans for several years, so he has the necessary experience to prosper in his business.  At harvest time he stores the crops in the graineries shown in the photograph.  He later sells them to the many clients he has in the area where he lives and uses the profits he earns to provide for his family.  

He is requesting a loan to buy better quality corn and bean seeds, as well as fertilizer and pesticides.  This is so he can give his family a life with better opportunities.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies, fertilizers, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Noe Antonio

texts.es: Don noe se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capasidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maiz y frijol, la cosecha que recoge la va almacenando en los graneros que muestra en la fotografia para luego salir a comercializalos en agencias de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, Don noe esta solicitando un credito para poder comparar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, entre otras cosas y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitacion.
texts.en:
Noe has been involved in farming for several years, which has given him the capacity and knowledge necessary to take care of his crops.  He mainly grows corn and beans and stores the crops in the graneries shown in the photograph.  He then sells them to basic grain agencies located near his residence.  He use the profits from sales to help cover household expenses.  He lives with his wife and children.

Noe is requesting a loan to buy farm supplies to help with the cultivation process, such as fertilizer, seeds and other products.  This will allow him to improve his profits and continue covering expenses at home without limitations.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Fatima Auxiliadora

texts.es: fatima vive con su esposo y su hijo en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias esta ubicada en su lugar de residencia y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda muy surtida, como toda buena comerciante  quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. y asi le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fatima lives with her husband and son in their own house.  She owns a store where she sells essential items such as beans, milk, eggs and bread, among others.  She has been in business for several years, and this has given her the sales experience needed to earn a better profit.  The store is set up in her home and she has many clients, as the store is very well stocked.

Like all good merchants, she wants to increase her business and make a new investment but does not have the necessary capital.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan to buy basic grains, sweets, eggs, bread, beverages, etc.  This will enable her to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy products for her store.

loans.name: Darwin Jose

texts.es:
Darwin tiene 23 años de edad es soltero el vive con su familia en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Darwin se  dedica a la  administración de una hacienda Solicita el crédito para comprar un refrigerador Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que le hace falta en la casa. 

La compra la realizará en  Ventanas El  sueño es comprar un solar para vivir con la familia para su cultivo y negocio tener ingresos. Los desafíos que enfrenta tener salud.

 En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y jugar
texts.en:
Darwin, 23, is single and lives with his family in Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.  He is a farm manager and is requesting a loan to buy a refrigerator.  The loan will help him buy what he needs for his home.

He will make his purchase in Ventanas.  His goal is to buy a plot of land where he and his family can grow crops and earn an income.  The challenge he faces is staying healthy.

In his free time he enjoys relaxing and playing.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Rilbert

texts.es:
Rilbert  es casado y tiene una hija de aproximadamente un año, viven en casa de los padres, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona San Martin  de la ciudad de El Alto.
El estudió hasta el nivel secundario y ahora trabaja en un taller de costura, su esposa se dedica al cuidado de su hija por la edad que tiene.
El crédito lo requiere para  adquirir material de construcción (estuco, pintura, lija, enchufes, etc.) ya que realizara el acabado en obra fina de dos habitaciones. Así mejorará las condiciones de vida de su familia. 
El sueño de Rilbert  es construir  su taller de costura y convertirse en un microempresario.
Es la primera  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Rilbert is married and has a daughter who is approximately one year old. They live at his parents’, in San Martin, city of El Alto. Rilbert finished secondary school and works in a tailor’s workshop, while his wife takes care of their small daughter.

Rilbert is requesting a loan to buy building material (plaster, paint, sandpaper, electric sockets, etc.), to finish two rooms. This will improve his family’s quality of life.

Rilbert’s dream is to start his own workshop and become an entrepreneur. This is his first loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy plaster, paints, sandpaper and electric sockets to finish two rooms in his parents' house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy grains, milk, eggs, canned food and beverages.

loans.name: José Isidro

texts.es:
José tiene 25 años de edad, esta acompañado. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde los 10 años de edad; fue si padre quien le enseño. Se levanta  a las 5:00 a.m. para prepararse e irse al trabajo, debido a que tiene que caminar una media hora para llegar al terreno en donde trabaja, el trabajo agrícola lo realiza por la mañana y por la tarde practica el futbol semiprofesional.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una motocicleta; para transportarse sin ninguna dificultad a sus dos trabajos. Pues actualmente se le hace muy difícil y riesgoso trasladarse de un lugar a otro, ya que de su entreno y partidos sale tarde. Su deseo es trabajar muy fuerte para ahorrar y construir su propia casa ya que vive con sus padres.
texts.en: José is 25 and has a girlfriend.  He has worked in farming since he was 10, learning from his father.  He gets up at 5am to get ready and get to work as it takes him half an hour to walk to the patch of land where he works.  He works in farming in the morning and in the afternoon he is a semi-professional footballer.  The loan which he is applying to Fundación Campo for will be used to buy a motorcycle so that he can travel easily between his two jobs.  At the moment all the travel from one place to another is difficult and dangerous for him, as training sessions and matches finish late.  His ambition is to work hard to save up and build his own home since he still lives with his parents.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle; to make travel between his two jobs easy.

loans.name: José  Mauricio

texts.es:
José tiene 43 años de edad, es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado a la agricultura en compañía de su padre y sus hermanos; como era el mayor de sus hermanos tenia más responsabilidad. A los 19 años de edad se acompaño, pero siempre siguió trabajando con su padre, cuando nacieron sus primeros hijos empezó a trabajar en lo propio. Para comprar los insumos agrícolas, debe viajar a 15 kilómetros de su casa, paga un medio de trasporte para que se los lleven a su casa y luego para un carretero para que los trasladen hasta el terreno. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar fertilizantes, abono, preparación del terreno y pago de mano de obra, para cultivar maíz. Espera mejorar su cosecha aplicando los insumos a tiempo y en las cantidades correctas para que la producción sea abundante y brindarles la oportunidad a sus hijos de enviarlos a la escuela y a la universidad.
texts.en:
José is 43 years old, married and has four children.  José has been working with his parents and siblings in agriculture since a very young age.  As the eldest sibling, José had the most responsibility.  At 19, he found a partner but continued to work alongside his father.  When his first children were born, José started to work alone.  José must travel 15km from his home to buy farming supplies.  He must pay for transport to take the goods to his home and, then, he must pay for a cart to take them to his land.

José is applying for a loan from "Fundación Campo" to buy fertiliser and manure, to prepare the land and to pay for labour costs, all to grow corn.  He hopes to improve his harvest through the timely and correct use of these supplies. He hopes he will have an abundant yield and that he will have the opportunity to send his children to school and university.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel tiene 22años de edad es casado el vive con esposa en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos

Miguel trabaja en una empresa es técnico en  compras de computadoras.  

Solicita el crédito para comprar cemento, varillas, tabla. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá realizar los arreglos de la vivienda. 

La compra lo realiza en Ventanas. El sueño es comprar un terreno .El desafío de  trabajar mucho más y no tener problemas. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y estar con su familia
texts.en:
Miguel is 22 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife in Ventanas, in the Los Ríos province.

Miguel works as a technician for a company that sells computers.

He is applying for a loan to buy cement, metal bars and wooden planks.  He will be able to make improvements to his home with the help of this loan.

He will make his purchases in Ventanas.  Miguel's dream is to buy land and his big challenges are to work much more and not have any problems.  In his free time he likes to relax and spend time with his family.

loans.use: to buy cement, metal bars and planks of wood.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 38 años de edad, esta acompañado. Desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado a trabajar en la agricultura junto con su abuelo, siendo el único varón de cinco hermanos tenía toda la responsabilidad para ayudar a mantener a su familia. A los 20 años de edad se acompaño y siempre le ayudo a su madre y hermanas. También trabaja comercializando bovinos. 

Para comprar los insumos agrícolas, debe viajar a 10 kilómetros de su casa, paga un medio de trasporte para que se los lleven a su casa y luego para un carretero para que los trasladen hasta el terreno. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar fertilizantes, abono, preparación del terreno y pago de mano de obra, para cultivar maíz. Con la inversión, pretende que su cosecha sea muy buena y poder venderla a buen precio para que sus ingresos sean mejores y poder construir su propia casa.
texts.en: Pedro is 38 and has a girlfriend.  Since he was a small boy he has worked in farming with his grandfather.  As the only male in the family (he has 5 sisters), he is solely responsible for supporting his family.  At the age of 20, he met his girlfriend but still helped his mother and sisters.  He also trades cattle.  When he wants to buy farming supplies, he has to travel 10 kilometres, pay for some means of transport to get his purchases home and then pay a cart driver to have them moved to the farm.  The loan which he is applying to Fundación Campo for will be used to buy fertiliser and manure, to prepare his land and pay his workers, and to grow corn.  He believes that the investment will help him have a good harvest and sell his corn at a good price.  This, in turn, will boost his income and enable him to build his own home.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser and manure, to prepare his land and pay his workers, and to grow corn.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Ms Sajida is a 32-year-old married woman.  She is a loving mother of six children, three daughter and three sons.  She is holding one of her daughters in the photo and the man shown in the photo is Sajida’s husband.  

Her husband is rickshaw driver and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw.  He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine.  For this reason, Sajida has applied for a loan of RS 20,000, for her husband.  He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle.  This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport services to his passengers.  Sajida is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Noreen  Bibi

texts.en:
Ms. Noreen is a 34-year-old married woman.  She is been in the business of making footballs for years.  She makes balls in different sizes and sells them in her community and in the local market.  Her husband is working as a laborer in a surgical factory.  His income is not enough to cover family expenditures while Noreen earns enough to bear the expenses of her family members.

She is a motivated mother of three; all are going to school.  She is wants to provide them with good quality food, education and clothing.  She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation.  Currently she requested a loan of RS. 30,000 to purchase stocks of threads, rubber bladders and leather covers to increase her sales.  She is in her 3rd loan cycle with a good repayment history.  She hopes to get an increase in her net income and desires to use part of the profits on her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase stock of threads, rubber bladders and leather covers to increase her sales.

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Ms Samina is 32 years old lady and a mother of two children; all are attending school.  She is very talented and excels in the work of manufacturing footballs. She receives large orders so she has hired some people for stitching footballs in order to complete the orders on time.  

She faced tough times after her separation but with the support of Kashf Foundation she was able to keep up her business.  Samina wants to provide all of the basic facilities to her children like good quality clothing and education.  For the improvement of her business, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of RS 20,000/-.  The amount will be used to purchase rubber bladders and leather covers in a large quantity to cater to more customers without delay. She is hoping to get an increase in her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more cash.  She dreams of expanding her business and desires to use part of the profits on her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase rubber bladders and leather covers in a large quantity to cater to more customers without delay.

loans.name: Aasya

texts.en:
Ms Aasya is a 38 year old married woman and the mother of four children.  For the past 1 year, she has been successfully running a business of milk sales in her vicinity.  She has two buffaloes who give milk; she has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk. 

She has a good client list and makes enough to contribute to the family income.  Her husband also supports her in running this business.  Aasya requested a loan of RS. 25,000 from Kashf Foundation to purchase one more buffalo to milk.  She expects to boost her earnings and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo in milk.

loans.name: Rokhaya's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est composé de 5 femmes qui habitent le même quartier;leur activité principal est le commerce.
   Rokhaya est la représentante du groupe,c'est elle qui a levé la main sur la photo.Elle a 63 ans, veuve et mère d'un garçon de 40 ans.Elle fait du commerce de denrée alimentaire dans son domicile. Avec son prêt elle compte renforcer son stock en achetant  150kg de sucre à 87 000f , 100L d'huile à 85 000f, 100kg de pain de singe à 48 000 et 10 cartons de savon à 75 000f et le reste en fond de roulement.Elle fait cette activité depuis toute jeune.
Ses bénéfices lui permettent de se prendre en charge et d'épargner dans le banc villageois.
texts.en: This group is composed of 5 women who live in the same neighborhood, and all involved in activities related to commerce. Rokhaya is the group representative, and can be seen in the photo with her hand raised. She is 63 years old, a widow, and mother of a 40 year old man. She has been involved in the buying and selling of food products from her home since a very young age. She is asking for a loan in order to reinforce her supplies, by purchasing 150 kg of sugar for 87,000 FCFA, 100 L of oil for 85,000 FCFA, 100 kg of "monkey bread" [a fruit from the Boabab tree] for 48,000 FCFA and 40 boxes of soap for 75,000 FCFA. The remaining amount will go to supplement her working capital. Profits from these activities will allow her to cover her living costs and deposit money in a village savings bank.

loans.use: purchase 150 kg of sugar, 100 L of oil, 100 kg of "monkey bread" [fruit from the Boabab tree] and 10 boxes of soap

loans.name: Shakira

texts.en: Ms. Shakira is a 49-year-old married woman. She is a vigorous lady, and for the past three years she has been selling different types of cloth. Shakira buys clothes of different fabrics in various colors and designs from the main market of the city at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community at reasonable prices. She has become famous for selling good quality clothes in her community. She knows that her husband’s income is not enough to cover the expenses of the family members. She is requesting 20,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of clothes in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. Shakira expects a boost in her earnings and has planned to spend the part of her profits on the betterment of her family members. Shakira dreams to provide a high quality education to her children with her business income.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of clothes in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory.

loans.name: Rehmat

texts.en: Ms. Rehmat is a 46-year-old, married woman and a mother of five. She has been running clothing business for many years. She purchases a variety of clothes from the main city and then sells them to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality clothes in her community. Rehmat requested a loan of PKR 15,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a stock of different clothes for the summer season by taking in account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through greater sales. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of different clothes of the summer season by taking in account the choices and tastes of her customers.

loans.name: Raphael

texts.fr: Raphael est un jeune camerounais de 28 ans exerçant depuis plus de 2 ans dans la vente des batteries de téléphone et autres accessoires (écouteurs,câbles, etc.). De plus, il fait dans le dépannage des téléphones.Soucieux du bien être de sa famille, Raphael souhaite avec le crédit acheter une grande quantité de batteries et accessoires de téléphone dans l'optique d'augmenter sa marge bénéficiaire. Une partie de ce bénéfice supplémentaire sera également réinjecté dans son activité.
texts.en: Raphael is a young 28 year old Cameroonian male who has, for more than two years, been involved in the sale of mobile phone batteries and other accessories (headphones, cables, etc). He also offers temporary mobile phones for customers whose phones are undergoing repairs. Conscious of the needs of his family, Raphael is asking for a loan in order to purchase a large quantity of materials and accessories in order to increase his sale margins. A portion of his profits will also be reinvested into his commercial activity.

loans.use: purchase merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase merchandise

loans.name: Tanzeela

texts.en: Ms. Tanzeela is a 24-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. She had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband to support her family. Two years ago she began stitching plastic bags in her house. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. Due to a lack of availability of funds, Tanzeela is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. That is why she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase stock of plastic materials needed for the bags with the spools of threads in various colors. In this way she will be able to complete the orders of her customers without delay.

loans.use: to purchase stock of plastic material to make bags and the spools of threads in various colors.

loans.name: Sharifan

texts.en: Ms. Sharifan is a 50-year-old married woman. She is trying hard to fulfill the demands of her family members such as food, health, and clothing. She has been running a small general store with the support of her husband, for many years. She offers various items at reasonable prices and has attained a list of regular customers. Sharifan wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy stocks of rice, flour and sugar to meet with the increasing demands of her customers. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend part of the profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, flour and sugar to meet with the increasing demands of her customers.

loans.name: Marie Francoise

texts.fr: Marie est une jeune camerounaise de 37 ans qui exerce depuis plus d'un an la coiffure.Célibataire et mère de 4 enfants respectivement de 16, 13, 8, et 6 ans, marie a de faibles revenus. Avec le crédit, elle souhaite augmenter ses revenus en achetant une plus grande quantité de mèches et faire de son salon un petit institut de beauté.Ce bénéfice lui permettra d'assurer la scolarité de ses enfants et améliorer leurs conditions de vie.
texts.en: Marie is a young, 37-year-old Cameroonian who has been working as a hairdresser for over a year. She is single and the mother of 4 children aged 16, 13, 8 and 6. Marie has a low income. She wishes to increase her revenues by using the loan to buy a larger quantity of hair extensions and convert her hair salon into a small beauty parlour. The profits will enable her to pay for her children's education and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and convert her hair salon into a small beauty parlour.

loans.name: Suraya

texts.en:
Ms. Suraya is a 50-year-old married woman. She has 2 cows and 1 buffalo that produce milk. She used to purchase goats and sheep and sell them at the festival of Eid-ul-Azha, gradually she began to purchase cows and buffalos to initiate the business of selling milk. She sells it to many of her neighbors, along with butter, cheese and ghee (oil) that she makes from the milk. She has earned a good client list. Her business is good enough to allow her a decent life.
She is a mother of ten, four daughter and six sons. Her sons also help in her business, while her husband does agriculture work. She is in the 7th loan cycle and has a strong association with Kashf foundation. She has taken several loans and each time she has paid back her loan in full and on time. Now she requested for a loan of PKR 35,000 to buy one more cow, to increase the production of milk. In this way she would be able to serve more people in her community. She wishes to utilize part of revenue on the marriage of her daughters.

loans.use: to buy one more cow to increase the production of milk.

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr: Ayélé est une femme âgée de 28 ans. Elle est mariée å un revendeur. Elle a 02 enfants  dont 01 à l’école. Ayélé travaille comme coiffeuse et revendeuse depuis 2010. Elle vend des mèches, des tissages et des chaussures pour tous clients dans son atelier. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir satisfaire tous ses clients. Ayélé a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des mèches, des tissages et des chaussures. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. Dans les prochaines années, Ayélé voudrait développer son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’assurer l’éducation de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ayélé is a 28-year-old woman. She is married to a merchant. She has 2 children, one of whom goes to school. Ayélé has been working as a hairdresser and retailer since 2010. She sells hair extensions, hair weaves and shoes to all types of customers in her studio. She gets the products in Lomé. She works alone. Currently, her main difficulty is that she is unable to satisfy all of her customers.

Ayélé has requested her second loan from WAGES in order to buy hair extensions, weaves and shoes. She wants to reinvest in her business. In the coming years, Ayélé would like to expand her business. She plans to use her profits to ensure that her family gets an education.

loans.use: To buy hair extensions, weaves and shoes.

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is 45 years old, married and a mother of four children. 

She has been efficiently running a business of milk sales for many years. Salma has two buffaloes and a cow. She also purchases small calves and sells them close to the Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries like Pakistan). She earns a good profit from this business.
Because of her work, Salma is respected. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got by sending three of her children to school for education.
